name: qsubdrg
body: |- wa(wcel(cq, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), cdr))

body.origin:
|- wa(wcel(cq, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), cdr))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wcel(cv(hs1), cq)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cq))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cq))
-| wcel(nat1, cq)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wcel(cv(hs1), cq)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cq))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cq), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cq))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cq)
-| diffsc(hs1, cq)
body.pretty:
⊢ (ℚ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld)∧(CCfld[|`s]ℚ)∈ DivRing)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℚ → hs0 ∈ ℂ)
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ ℚ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℚ)→(hs0[+]hs1)∈ ℚ)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℚ → -u(hs0)∈ ℚ)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℚ
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ ℚ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℚ)→(hs0[×]hs1)∈ ℚ)
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ ℚ ∧ hs0 ≠ 0)→(1[÷]hs0)∈ ℚ)
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, ℚ)
⊣ d(hs1, ℚ)
